participant_1.background:
I believe that I have a good relationship with my family.
I collect movie memorabilia from my favorite movies.
i have freckles all over my face.
during the week , i work as a barista.
I often neglect my own creative work in favor of my job.

participant_2.background:
I enjoy rock music when I'm cooking dinner or driving my Mustang.
i ride horses.
my ultimate dream , however , is to be a writer.
I have a baby monitor that I use to watch my baby while I play video games.
I like to pamper myself.

content.text: Hello! My name is Chris, I like to collect movie memorabilia, how about yourself?
I am Jessica, I enjoy rock music when I'm cooking dinner or driving my Mustang, what do you do for fun?
I work as a barista during the week and like to pamper myself. Do you have any hobbies?
I love to ride horses, and my ultimate dream is to be a writer! What about you?
I often neglect my own creative work in favor of my job, but I do enjoy writing short stories.
That's really cool! Maybe we can collaborate on a story sometime!
That would be fun! I'd love to hear some of your ideas.
Sure, I can send you some of my writing later. In the meantime, I'm going to go ride my horse!
Have fun! I'll talk to you later.
